CustomField.description: This field represents whether a debt is a source debt. If the output is 'True' then debt is a source debt.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( LLC_BI__Source_Debt__c ) && ISBLANK( LLC_BI__Internal_Debt__c ) && LLC_BI__Is_Manual__c = FALSE && LLC_BI__New_Debt__c = FALSE, True, False)
CustomField.label: Is Source Debt
